entry.title: Sunday night: A few clouds. Low minus 26.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Fog patches developing overnight. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light early this evening. Low minus 26. Wind chill minus 22 this evening and minus 31 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Sunday 05 March 2023

entry.title: Monday: Mainly sunny. High minus 16.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 16. Wind chill minus 31 in the morning and minus 22 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Sunday 05 March 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 29.
